00025 class XTempControl : public XPrimaryDriver
00026 {
00027     XNODE_OBJECT

00030                  const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00031                  const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00032                  const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00033                  const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00034 public:
00035     //! usually nothing to do

00037     //! show all forms belonging to driver
00038     virtual void showForms();

00040     class XChannel : public XNode
00041     {
00042         XNODE_OBJECT
00043     protected:
00044         XChannel(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &list);
00045     public:
00046         shared_ptr<XItemNode<XThermometerList, XThermometer> > &thermometer() 
00047         {return m_thermometer;}
00048         const   shared_ptr<XComboNode> &excitation() const {return m_excitation;}
00049     private:
00050         shared_ptr<XItemNode<XThermometerList, XThermometer> > m_thermometer;
00051         shared_ptr<XComboNode> m_excitation;
00052     };

00073     //! Start up your threads, connect GUI, and activate signals
00074     virtual void start();
00075     //! Shut down your threads, unconnect GUI, and deactivate signals
00076     //! this may be called even if driver has already stopped.
00077     virtual void stop();
00078   
00079     //! this is called when raw is written 
00080     //! unless dependency is broken
00081     //! convert raw to record
00082     virtual void analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&);
00083     //! this is called after analyze() or analyzeRaw()
00084     //! record is readLocked
00085     virtual void visualize();

00087     //! register channel names in your constructor
00088     //! \param multiread if true, simultaneous reading of multi channels.
00089     //! \param channel_names array of pointers to channel name. ends with null pointer.

00092                         bool multiread, const char **channel_names, const char **excitations);
